verses.verse: שִׁמְע֤וּ <WH8085> shim-'U Listen אִיִּים֙ <WH339> 'i-Yim O isles אֵלַ֔י <WH413> 'e-Lai, and to וְהַקְשִׁ֥יבוּ <WH7181> ve-hak-Shi-vu unto me and hearken לְאֻמִּ֖ים <WH3816> le-'um-Mim ye people מֵרָח֑וֹק <WH7350> me-ra-Chok; from far יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD מִבֶּ֣טֶן <WH990> mib-Be-ten me from the womb קְרָאָ֔נִי <WH7121> ke-ra-'A-ni, hath called מִמְּעֵ֥י <WH4578> mi-me-'Ei from the bowels אִמִּ֖י <WH517> 'im-Mi of my mother הִזְכִּ֥יר <WH2142> hiz-Kir hath he made mention שְׁמִֽי׃ <WH8034> she-Mi. of my name

וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <WH7760> vai-Ya-sem And he hath made פִּי֙ <WH6310> pi my mouth כְּחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> ke-Che-rev sword חַדָּ֔ה <WH2299> chad-Dah, like a sharp בְּצֵ֥ל <WH6738> be-Tzel in the shadow יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do of his hand הֶחְבִּיאָ֑נִי <WH2244> hech-bi-'A-ni; hath he hid וַיְשִׂימֵ֙נִי֙ <WH7760> vay-si-Me-ni me and made לְחֵ֣ץ <WH2671> le-Chetz shaft בָּר֔וּר <WH1305> ba-Rur, me a polished בְּאַשְׁפָּת֖וֹ <WH827> be-'ash-pa-To in his quiver הִסְתִּירָֽנִי׃ <WH5641> his-ti-Ra-ni. hath he hid

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And said לִ֖י li עַבְדִּי־ <WH5650> 'av-di- unto me Thou [art] my servant אָ֑תָּה <WH859> 'At-tah; you יִשְׂרָאֵ֕ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El O Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- Whom בְּךָ֖ be-Cha אֶתְפָּאָֽר׃ <WH6286> 'et-pa-'Ar. in whom I will be glorified

וַאֲנִ֤י <WH589> va-'a-Ni I אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <WH559> 'a-Mar-ti Then I said לְרִ֣יק <WH7385> le-Rik in vain יָגַ֔עְתִּי <WH3021> ya-Ga'-ti, I have laboured לְתֹ֥הוּ <WH8414> le-To-hu for nought וְהֶ֖בֶל <WH1892> ve-He-vel and in vain כֹּחִ֣י <WH3581> ko-Chi my strength כִלֵּ֑יתִי <WH3615> chil-Lei-ti; I have spent אָכֵן֙ <WH403> 'a-Chen [yet] surely מִשְׁפָּטִ֣י <WH4941> mish-pa-Ti my judgment אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- is with יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, [is] with the LORD וּפְעֻלָּתִ֖י <WH6468> u-fe-'ul-la-Ti and my work אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hai. with my God

וְעַתָּ֣ה׀ <WH6258> ve-'at-Tah and now אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar And now saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God יֹצְרִ֤י <WH3335> yo-tze-Ri that formed מִבֶּ֙טֶן֙ <WH990> mib-Be-ten me from the womb לְעֶ֣בֶד <WH5650> le-'E-ved [to be] his servant ל֔וֹ lo, לְשׁוֹבֵ֤ב <WH7725> le-sho-Vev again יַֽעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko Jacob אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, to him וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> ve-Yis-ra-'El to him Though Israel; לֹא lo כלֹ֣ו <WH3808> Lo not קיֵאָסֵ֑ף <WH622> ye-'a-Sef; be not gathered וְאֶכָּבֵד֙ <WH3513> ve-'ek-ka-Ved yet shall I be glorious בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> be-'ei-Nei in the eyes יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, God וֵאלֹהַ֖י <WH430> ve-lo-Hai and my God הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> ha-Yah become עֻזִּֽי׃ <WH5797> 'uz-Zi. shall be my strength

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer, And he said נָקֵ֨ל <WH7043> na-Kel It is a light thing מִֽהְיוֹתְךָ֥ <WH1961> mih-yot-Cha may reach לִי֙ li עֶ֔בֶד <WH5650> 'E-ved, that thou shouldest be my servant לְהָקִים֙ <WH6965> le-ha-Kim to raise up אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שִׁבְטֵ֣י <WH7626> shiv-Tei the tribes יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko, of Jacob; וּנְצִירֵי u-ne-tzi-rei כוּנְצוּרֵ֥י <WH5336> u-ne-tzu-Rei preserved קיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לְהָשִׁ֑יב <WH7725> le-ha-Shiv; and to restore וּנְתַתִּ֙יךָ֙ <WH5414> u-ne-tat-Ti-cha I will also give לְא֣וֹר <WH216> le-'or thee for a light גּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> go-Yim, to the Gentiles לִֽהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> lih-Yot may reach יְשׁוּעָתִ֖י <WH3444> ye-shu-'a-Ti that thou mayest be my salvation עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against קְצֵ֥ה <WH7097> ke-Tzeh unto the end הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. of the earth ס sa-Mek

כֹּ֣ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָֽמַר־ <WH559> 'a-mar- Thus saith יְהוָה֩ <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD גֹּאֵ֨ל <WH1350> go-'El the Redeemer יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel קְדוֹשׁ֗וֹ <WH6918> ke-do-Sho, [and] his Holy One לִבְזֹה־ <WH960> liv-zoh- despiseth נֶ֜פֶשׁ <WH5315> Ne-fesh to him whom man לִמְתָ֤עֵֽב <WH8581> lim-Ta-'ev abhorreth גּוֹי֙ <WH1471> goy to him whom the nation לְעֶ֣בֶד <WH5650> le-'E-ved to a servant מֹשְׁלִ֔ים <WH4910> mo-she-Lim, of rulers מְלָכִים֙ <WH4428> me-la-Chim Kings יִרְא֣וּ <WH7200> yir-'U shall see וָקָ֔מוּ <WH6965> va-Ka-mu, and arise שָׂרִ֖ים <WH8269> sa-Rim princes וְיִֽשְׁתַּחֲוּ֑וּ <WH7812> ve-yish-ta-chav-Vu; also shall worship לְמַ֤עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an Because יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh because of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who נֶאֱמָ֔ן <WH539> ne-'e-Man, that is faithful קְדֹ֥שׁ <WH6918> ke-Dosh [and] the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וַיִּבְחָרֶֽךָּ׃ <WH977> vai-yiv-cha-Re-ka. and he shall choose

כֹּ֣ה׀ <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD בְּעֵ֤ת <WH6256> be-'Et time רָצוֹן֙ <WH7522> ra-tzOn In an acceptable עֲנִיתִ֔יךָ <WH6030> 'a-ni-Ti-cha, have I heard וּבְי֥וֹם <WH3117> u-ve-Yom thee and in a day יְשׁוּעָ֖ה <WH3444> ye-shu-'Ah of salvation עֲזַרְתִּ֑יךָ <WH5826> 'a-zar-Ti-cha; have I helped וְאֶצָּרְךָ֗ <WH5341> ve-'etz-tza-re-Cha, thee and I will preserve וְאֶתֶּנְךָ֙ <WH5414> ve-'et-ten-Cha thee and give לִבְרִ֣ית <WH1285> liv-Rit thee for a covenant עָ֔ם <WH5971> 'Am, of the people לְהָקִ֣ים <WH6965> le-ha-Kim to establish אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz, the earth לְהַנְחִ֖יל <WH5157> le-han-Chil to cause to inherit נְחָל֥וֹת <WH5159> ne-cha-Lot heritages שֹׁמֵמֽוֹת׃ <WH8074> sho-me-Mot. the desolate

לֵאמֹ֤ר <WH559> le-Mor That thou mayest say לַֽאֲסוּרִים֙ <WH631> la-'a-su-Rim to the prisoners צֵ֔אוּ <WH3318> Tze-'u, Go forth לַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> la-'a-Sher after בַּחֹ֖שֶׁךְ <WH2822> ba-Cho-shech to them that [are] in darkness הִגָּל֑וּ <WH1540> hig-ga-Lu; Shew עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- Along דְּרָכִ֣ים <WH1870> de-ra-Chim in the ways יִרְע֔וּ <WH7462> yir-'U, yourselves They shall feed וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> u-ve-Chol all שְׁפָיִ֖ים <WH8205> she-fa-Yim [shall be] in all high places מַרְעִיתָֽם׃ <WH4830> mar-'i-Tam. and their pastures

לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo Nor יִרְעָ֙בוּ֙ <WH7456> yir-'A-vu They shall not hunger וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo Nor יִצְמָ֔אוּ <WH6770> yitz-Ma-'u, nor thirst וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- Nor יַכֵּ֥ם <WH5221> yak-Kem smite שָׁרָ֖ב <WH8273> sha-Rav neither shall the heat וָשָׁ֑מֶשׁ <WH8121> va-Sha-mesh; nor sun כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for מְרַחֲמָ֣ם <WH7355> me-ra-cha-Mam them for he that hath mercy יְנַהֲגֵ֔ם <WH5090> ye-na-ha-Gem, on them shall lead וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and מַבּ֥וּעֵי <WH4002> mab-Bu-'ei them even by the springs מַ֖יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim of water יְנַהֲלֵֽם׃ <WH5095> ye-na-ha-Lem. shall he guide

וְשַׂמְתִּ֥י <WH7760> ve-sam-Ti And I will make כָל־ <WH3605> chol all הָרַ֖י <WH2022> ha-Rai all my mountains לַדָּ֑רֶךְ <WH1870> lad-Da-rech; a way וּמְסִלֹּתַ֖י <WH4546> u-me-sil-lo-Tai and my highways יְרֻמֽוּן׃ <WH7311> ye-ru-Mun. shall be exalted

הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> hin-neh- Behold אֵ֕לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh these מֵרָח֖וֹק <WH7350> me-ra-Chok from far יָבֹ֑אוּ <WH935> ya-Vo-'u; Behold these shall come וְהִֽנֵּה־ <WH2009> ve-hin-neh- and lo אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> 'el-leh these מִצָּפ֣וֹן <WH6828> mitz-tza-Fon and lo these from the north וּמִיָּ֔ם <WH3220> u-mi-Yam, and from the west וְאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh and these מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz and these from the land סִינִֽים׃ <WH5515> si-Nim. of Sinim

רָנּ֤וּ <WH7442> ran-Nu Sing שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim O heavens וְגִ֣ילִי <WH1523> ve-Gi-li and be joyful אָ֔רֶץ <WH776> 'A-retz, O earth; יִפְצְחוּ yif-tze-chu כוּפִצְח֥וּ <WH6476> u-fitz-Chu break forth קהָרִ֖ים <WH2022> ha-Rim O mountains רִנָּ֑ה <WH7440> rin-Nah; into singing כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for נִחַ֤ם <WH5162> ni-Cham hath comforted יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh for the LORD עַמּ֔וֹ <WH5971> am-Mo, his people וַעֲנִיָּ֖ו <WH6041> va-'a-ni-Yav upon his afflicted יְרַחֵֽם׃ <WH7355> ye-ra-Chem. and will have mercy ס sa-Mek

וַתֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vat-To-mer said צִיּ֖וֹן <WH6726> tzi-Yon But Zion עֲזָבַ֣נִי <WH5800> 'a-za-Va-ni hath forsaken יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; The LORD וַאדֹנָ֖י <WH136> va-do-Nai me and my Lord שְׁכֵחָֽנִי׃ <WH7911> she-che-Cha-ni. hath forgotten

הֲתִשְׁכַּ֤ח <WH7911> ha-tish-Kach forget אִשָּׁה֙ <WH802> 'ish-Shah Can a woman עוּלָ֔הּ <WH5764> 'u-Lah, her sucking child מֵרַחֵ֖ם <WH7355> me-ra-Chem that she should not have compassion בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- on the son בִּטְנָ֑הּ <WH990> bit-Nah; belly גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- again אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh these תִשְׁכַּ֔חְנָה <WH7911> tish-Kach-nah, yet will I not forget וְאָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> ve-'a-no-Chi I לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo I will not אֶשְׁכָּחֵֽךְ׃ <WH7911> 'esh-ka-Chech. forget

הֵ֥ן <WH2005> hen Behold עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on כַּפַּ֖יִם <WH3709> kap-Pa-yim thee upon the palms of [my] hands חַקֹּתִ֑יךְ <WH2710> chak-ko-Tich; Behold I have graven חוֹמֹתַ֥יִךְ <WH2346> cho-mo-Ta-yich thy walls נֶגְדִּ֖י <WH5048> neg-Di before תָּמִֽיד׃ <WH8548> ta-Mid. [are] continually

מִֽהֲר֖וּ <WH4116> mi-ha-Ru shall make haste בָּנָ֑יִךְ <WH1121> ba-Na-yich; Thy children מְהָֽרְסַ֥יִךְ <WH2040> me-ha-re-Sa-yich thy destroyers וּמַחֲרִבַ֖יִךְ <WH2717> u-ma-cha-ri-Va-yich and they that made thee waste מִמֵּ֥ךְ <WH4480> mi-Mech at יֵצֵֽאוּ׃ <WH3318> ye-Tze-'u. shall go forth

שְׂאִֽי־ <WH5375> se-'i- Lift up סָבִ֤יב <WH5439> sa-Viv round about עֵינַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5869> 'ei-Na-yich thine eyes וּרְאִ֔י <WH7200> u-re-'I, and behold כֻּלָּ֖ם <WH3605> kul-Lam All נִקְבְּצ֣וּ <WH6908> nik-be-Tzu all these gather themselves together בָֽאוּ־ <WH935> va-'u- [and] come לָ֑ךְ Lach; חַי־ <WH2416> chai- to thee [As] I live אָ֣נִי <WH589> 'A-ni I נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ne-'um- saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki will surely כֻלָּם֙ <WH3605> chul-Lam all כָּעֲדִ֣י <WH5716> ka-'a-Di thee with them all as with an ornament תִלְבָּ֔שִׁי <WH3847> til-Ba-shi, thou shalt surely clothe וּֽתְקַשְּׁרִ֖ים <WH7194> u-te-kash-she-Rim and bind כַּכַּלָּֽה׃ <WH3618> kak-kal-Lah. them [on thee] as a bride

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki For חָרְבֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH2723> cha-re-vo-Ta-yich For thy waste וְשֹׁ֣מְמֹתַ֔יִךְ <WH8074> ve-Sho-me-mo-Ta-yich, and thy desolate places וְאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> ve-'E-retz and the land הֲרִֽסֻתֵ֑יךְ <WH2035> ha-ri-su-Teich; of thy destruction כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> 'at-Tah now תֵּצְרִ֣י <WH3334> te-tze-Ri shall even now be too narrow מִיּוֹשֵׁ֔ב <WH3427> mi-yo-Shev, by reason of the inhabitants וְרָחֲק֖וּ <WH7368> ve-ra-cha-Ku shall be far away מְבַלְּעָֽיִךְ׃ <WH1104> me-val-le-'A-yich. and they that swallowed thee up

ע֚וֹד <WH5750> od will yet יֹאמְר֣וּ <WH559> yo-me-Ru the other shall say בְאָזְנַ֔יִךְ <WH241> ve-'a-ze-Na-yich, again in thine ears בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> be-Nei The children שִׁכֻּלָ֑יִךְ <WH7923> shik-ku-La-yich; which thou shalt have after thou hast lost צַר־ <WH6862> tzar- [is] too strait לִ֥י li הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> ham-ma-Kom The place גְּשָׁה־ <WH5066> ge-shah- for me give לִּ֥י li וְאֵשֵֽׁבָה׃ <WH3427> ve-'e-She-vah. to me that I may dwell
